title.narrative: Rural Development: Pilot Community-Based Rural Infrastructure Project for Highland Areas

description.narrative: The development goal of the project is improvement in living standards for the rural poor in the remote highland communities. The specific objectives would be to: (i) empower communities to be proactive in resolving infrastructure constraints; (ii) reduce the isolation of communities and improve overall mobility and access to markets and services in highland areas; (iii) institutionalise community-led village access road improvement within the overall framework for the development of the rural road network; and (iv) provide improved access to poor households to sustainable drinking water supplies.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Pilot Community-Based Rural Infrastructure Project for Highland Areas

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
